Title: Relates to maternal health care and birthing best practices; repealer
Summary: Requires the department of health to evaluate and make recommendations related to maternal health care and birthing best practices; repeals certain provisions.
LawCode: Rpld ยง1, amd ยง2, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.7702-A & A.8207-A); amd ยง2500, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health to evaluate and make recommendations related to maternal health care and birthing best practices; to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 requiring the department of health to convene a maternal health care and birthing standards workgroup, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 7702-A and A. 8207-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and to repeal section 1 of such chapter
